Name: 鉄と苦難の商会・茸ステーション@{M}$Iron & Misery Company -> アイアン＆ミザリー社$Iron & Misery Company Funging Station
Description:
鉄と苦難はここで茸採取施設を運営しており、巨大なボルチーニ茸を伐採して建造資材を作ったり、芹を収穫して'医学的な'目的に供したりしている。この場所は、文明全体の中でも小さく、途方も無い程の最果ての地である。

愛想の良い代理商が一服していた。「ああようこそ、キャプテン!訪問者が来るなんてな、神に感謝しよう。此処には娯楽らしい娯楽が無くてな、気が狂っちまうよ...ハッハッハ。いや本当に気が狂うぞ。さて、何か御用ですかな?@{M}I&M has a funger operation here, felling giant bolegus shrooms for building materials, harvesting kirralee for its 'medicinal' properties. It's a desperate little outpost of something like civilisation. 

Up puffs the Affable Factor. "Oh hello, Captain! Thank God for visitors. We'd go quite mad out here otherwise, ahahaha. Quite mad. How can we be of assistance?"

DefaultEvent.Name: 緊張した笑顔@{M}A strained smile
DefaultEvent.Description: 「ああ、ああ。ここにあるぞ。パルマストン山への商船がここに立ち寄ってくれたんだ。提督府に伝えてくれ - 彼らに、我が子が恋しいと伝えてくれ。彼らに、私はもう此処に長く留まる事は出来ないと伝えてくれ。胞子が...闇が。」@{M}$Admiralty -> 海軍省, (Mt?.|Mount) Palmerston -> マウント・パーマーストン$"Yes - yes, I have it here. The courier-ship to Mt Palmerston stopped off to resupply. Tell the Admiralty - tell them I miss my children. Tell them I can't take it here much longer. The spores, the dark."

ChildBranches.Name: 愛想の良い代理商に暗証サインを渡す@{M}Give the pass-sign to the Affable Factor
ChildBranches.Description: 総督府は貴方に、戦略情報を持ち帰る様に依頼してきた。これが連絡先だ。@{M}$Admiralty -> 海軍省, Strategic Information -> 戦略的情報$The Admiralty asked you to bring back Strategic Information. This is your contact.

DefaultEvent.Name: 幕間の出来事@{M}An interlude
DefaultEvent.Description:
貴方は代理人の家のベランダに座り、茸の密林を見渡している。広大な緑と、少しくすんだ金色の密林だった。空気は漂う胞子によって厚みがある。出されたスコーンは湿気っている。紅茶にも、白カビが微かに混じっているようだ。しかし、代理人は良い仲間だ。彼はアイレムの、氷と薔薇に纏わる奇妙な話、鬼百合海の巨大な怪異、そしてベンダーバイトにある、彼が舌鼓を打った最高の海鮮料理を提供する、小さなレストランの事を教えてくれた。(「ベンダーバイト!ああ知っているとも!私は料理が出来る墳墓の入植者を今までに見た事が無かった!君も一度行ってみるべきだ。場所は知っているか?」)

また彼は、貴方の船に積まれたボルチーニの塊を沢山所有している。彼は手を振り貴方の謝意を遮った。「なに、私自身が茸に生まれ変わってしまうのではと恐れるほど、食べ飽きてしまったからな。」そう言うと、彼は顔を近づけて声を潜める。「実際そうなってしまうのだ。最もそうなるまでには膨大な量を食べ続けねばならんがね。」@{M}$Irem -> アイレム, Sea of Lilies -> 百合の海, Venderbight -> ヴェンダーバイト$You sit on the verandah of the Factor's house, looking out over the fungal jungle: an expanse of green and sour gold. The air is thick with hovering spores. The scones are stale. Even the tea has a hint of mildew. But the Factor is good company: he shares odd stories about the ice and roses of Irem, the monstrosities of the Sea of Lilies, and a little restaurant in Venderbight where he enjoyed the most extraordinary sea-food. ("Venderbight! I know! I'd never met a tomb-colonist who could cook! But you must visit the place. Do you know it?")

He also has a load of bolegus-frond carted aboard your ship. He waves away your thanks. "I have eaten so much of the stuff I fear that I might be transformed entirely into fungus." He leans confidentially towards you. "It happens, you know. But one does have to eat rather a lot of it first."

ChildBranches.Name: 代理人との茶飲み@{M}Tea with the Factor
ChildBranches.Description: みずぼらしい男は仲間を必要としており、彼はスケジュールの合間をぬって1時間用意してくれた。@{M}The poor fellow needs the company, and he can spare an hour away from his schedule.

ChildBranches.Name: デミオー島を探索する@{M}$Demeaux Island -> デミオー・アイランド$Explore Demeaux Island
ChildBranches.Description: ボルチーニと芹の混在する、ごちゃごちゃした密林。鉄と苦難の商会は毎日これらを切り倒しているが、それと同じぐらいの速さで育っていくそうだ。島の内部はとても鬱蒼としていて、自然のままである。@{M}Close-crowded thickets of bolegus and skirralee. The Iron & Misery company fells them daily, but they grow back almost as fast. The interior of the island is dark and wild.

ChildBranches.Name: デミオー島を探索する@{M}$Demeaux Island -> デミオー・アイランド$Explore Demeaux Island

DefaultEvent.Name: 契約完了@{M}Signing up
DefaultEvent.Description: 貴方は代理人に解放金を支払い、新たな船乗りを獲得した。さぁ航海の準備は良いか?@{M}You pay the release-fee to the Factor, and your new zailor settles in. Ready to zail now?

ChildBranches.Name: 志願者を受け入れる@{M}Accept a volunteer
ChildBranches.Description: 商会のボルチーニ採りの一人が、契約の早期解除を求めて交渉をしていた。「それ芽キャベツのようなもの。」何かを言いたそうに、彼女が言う。「私ここに縛られてる間、ずっと採り続けてる。私の髪も、私の目も。私連れてって。私働き者。」@{M}One of Company's bolegus-fellers has negotiated an early release from her contract. "It's the sproutlings," she tells you, her face pleading. "I keep picking them out of me porridge. And me hair. And me eyes. Take me away. I'm a good worker."

DefaultEvent.Name: 帰省のようなもの@{M}A kind of homecoming
DefaultEvent.Description: ブレミガンは飛び跳ねるようにして動き回っている。ボルチーニの幹に上り、周りを回って、密林の中に入っていく。囀りを発しながら茸の密林の奥に進んでいくと、何処からか返答の囀りが聞こえてくる。ここには既にブレミガンが居たようだ。@{M}$[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$The blemmigan propels itself into a springing leap: up to a bolegus trunk, around, into the thickets. It whistles as it goes, and deeper in the fungal jungle, a whistling rises in response. There are already blemmigans here.

ChildBranches.Name: ブレミガンを浜に揚げる@{M}$[Bb]lemmigan -> ブレミガン$Put a blemmigan ashore
ChildBranches.Description: 最も、快適とは程遠いが...@{M}Though it's far from hospitable...

DefaultEvent.Name: 共有された、忌まわしき過去@{M}A shared and sordid past
DefaultEvent.Description:
金を渡しても、代理人は話を嫌がっている -しかしどうやら、砲撃手は'かつての'彼の事を知っているように見える。また、彼も砲撃手がその過去について話をするのをよりひどく嫌がっているようだった。やがて、彼は降参した。

「それは、エスティバルと呼ばれる場所だった。知っているか?そこは...何というか...印象的な場所だったよ。教えたとしても、お前は信じないだろうな。そこは東にある。遥か遠い東だ。私達は地図からそれを除外した。何れにしてもその地図はジーじゃ役に立たん。それが私の知っている全てだ。さぁ、私達の過去の話はこれでおしまいだ。もう良いだろう?」@{M}$Aestival -> エスティヴァル$Even with the bribe, the Factor is reluctant to talk - but it seems the Cannoneer knew him 'in the old days', and he's even more reluctant to have the Cannoneer talk about the old days. Finally, he gives in.

"It was a place called Aestival. Do you know it? It's, hm, a striking place. You wouldn't believe me if I told you. It's east. A long way east. We took it off all the maps. Not that maps last at zee anyway. That's all I know. Now - shall we let the past lie where it fell?"

ChildBranches.Name: 代理人と秘密について取引する@{M}Bargain with the Factor for a secret
ChildBranches.Description: 堪え性のない砲撃手は、代理人は、商会が持つ恐ろしい試作品の武器について更に知っている事があると確信している。聞き出すには袖の下が必要だろう。これは公正な取引だ。@{M}The Irrepressible Cannoneer is convinced that the Factor knows more about a weapon - the Company's terrible prototype. You will need a bribe. It's only fair.

DefaultEvent.Description:

The air is thick with hovering spores. The scones are stale. Even the tea has a hint of mildew. But the Factor is good company: he shares odd stories about the Gant Pole where monsters swarm, about the seductions of the Principles of Coral, the infestation at Featherhaven...

He also has a load of bolegus-frond carted aboard your ship. He waves away your thanks. "I have eaten so much of the stuff I fear that I might be transformed entirely into fungus." He leans confidentially towards you. "It happens, you know. But one does have to eat rather a lot of it first."

ChildBranches.Name: 代理人との茶飲み@{M}Tea with the Factor
ChildBranches.Description: みずぼらしい男は仲間を必要としており、彼はスケジュールの合間をぬって1時間用意してくれた。@{M}The poor fellow needs the company, and he can spare an hour away from his schedule.

DefaultEvent.Name: 胞子の仕事@{M}The business of spores
DefaultEvent.Description: 勿論、鉄と苦難が此処で行っている活動は興味をそそるようには見えない。何れにしても、記録出来るものは記録しておけ。@{M}Of course, I&M's activities here don't seem that interesting. Nevertheless, record what you can.

ChildBranches.Name: 港湾報告書をまとめる@{M}$Port Report -> 港湾報告書$Compile a Port Report
ChildBranches.Description: 提督府は鉄と苦難の商会の活動に目を光らせる事を好む。@{M}$Admiralty -> 海軍省$The Admiralty likes to keep an eye on Iron & Misery's activities.

DefaultEvent.Name: A desperate joy
DefaultEvent.Description: The Affable Factor covers his mouth as he peers into the crate. He turns and stumbles, sobbing, into your arms. "Meat? Oh, bless you! Please, in thanks..." He waves in two sturdy bolegus-fellers bearing a coffin. "Part of a misdelivered consignment. I'm sure you'll find some use for it. And if not - well, there are always buyers."

ChildBranches.Name: Provide a respite from mushrooms
ChildBranches.Description:
$Strange Catch -> 奇妙な漁獲物$Here, it's mushrooms for every meal. A sign on the dock, blotched by mildew, promises a reward for anyone who provides an alternative.
 [Trade two Strange Catches for a Sooth & Cooper Long-Box.]

DefaultEvent.Name: "A moth, you say?"
DefaultEvent.Description:
"Can't say as it was how he'd have wanted to go, but I don't think he ever intended to go at all." The Affable Factor sighs and lights his pipe. The fungal smoke is all too familiar.

"Knew he'd meet a bad end with that lot. Too much stirring up trouble, not enough enjoying what they'd got. Seven's an unlucky number, if you ask me." He rests a hand on the coffin. "Thank you anyway. I'll do something appropriate with him."

ChildBranches.Name: Deliver Lorenzo's remains to the Factor
ChildBranches.Description: The Affable Factor receives his brother's coffin solemnly. You counsel against looking within.

DefaultEvent.Name: Whispered confidences
DefaultEvent.Description:
The Tomb Colonist draws you a little way away from the Cladery Heir. "Don't tell her you met me," he says, in hoarse rasp. "Her mother cut my voice. Hoped to fix it so I wouldn't be able to look for my daughter. So I wouldn't want to." He wheezes. "Didn't work. Operations never... completely effective. Need to know my daughter's well. Happy. Finding enough patients. Getting enough to eat and so forth."

In exchange for the simplest news, he explains himself: "I'm her father," he says. "Ordinary engineer. Not the sort of parent she would want." [If you wish to tell the Heir about this encounter, you can do so by speaking with her.]

ChildBranches.Name: A bandaged funger
ChildBranches.Description: One of the funging workers is watching your crew, and watching the Cladery Heir especially. What does he want?

DefaultEvent.Name: 楽しい寄り道@{K}A pleasant distraction
DefaultEvent.Description:
こうしてあなたは家路につく代理人に道でたまたま出くわした。なんて素敵な偶然だ！あなた一人ではこのピクニックバスケットに入った料理をとても食べきれなかっただろう。彼は誰かとともに食事ができることに大喜びしてあなたと腰掛に座り、一時間もの間ふたりで愉快にサンドイッチを食べた。そしてあなたは放蕩者が通り過ぎたのを見ると、すぐに代理人にいとまを告げた。

あなたが船に戻ると、放蕩者が陽気な笑い声をあげた。袖口の紅玉が光を受けてきらめく。「アイアン＆ミザリーはポート・セシルの競技会に代表者を送りこむつもりなんですよ。そしてその競技会はあらかじめすべての参加者に全日程表を作っているのです。独裁者の予定を記録することができました。」@{K}$Port Cecil -> ポート・セシル$It just so happens that you bump into the Factor on his walk home. What a happy coincidence! You couldn't possibly manage this entire picnic basket by yourself. Overjoyed to have company he joins you on a bench for the next hour, merrily eating sandwiches. You take your leave once you have seen the Gallivant pass by. 

Back on your deck, the Gallivant laughs jovially. His rubies wink in the light. "Iron and Misery will be sending a representative to the contest in Port Cecil. There's a full itinerary for all of the events, tailored for every attendee. I have the dictator's moves mapped."

ChildBranches.Name: 端的で難解な物言いの放蕩者のため適切な場所に適切なタイミングで立つ@{K}Stand in the right place at the right time for the Gnomic Gallivant
ChildBranches.Description: "「コメディアンは好きではありません。私はまじめな人間ですので。しかし一つだけ彼らに同意できることがあります。それは重要なのはタイミングだということです。だからこそ私はこれから代理人の家に忍び込むのであり、その間あなたには私が特別な日程表を見つけるまで彼の気を引いておいていただかなければならないのです。」@{K}I don't like comedians. I am a very serious man. But we agree on one thing: timing. That's why I'm breaking into the Factor's home, and why I need you to distract him until I've found a special itinerary."

DefaultEvent.Name: 恐怖の澱み@{M}A fug of dread
DefaultEvent.Description: 胞子が貴方の顔全体に分厚くまとわりつく。舌が瞬く間に覆われてしまう。船乗りの一人が突然すすり泣きを始めた。「何てこった...」彼は呟く。「胞子が心臓についちまった。俺は茸になってしまう...収穫されちまう!」取り乱した彼が静かになってしまう前に、貴方は彼を船に引き戻さなければならない。@{M}The spores lie thick on your face: they coat your tongues. One crewman begins to whimper. "Oh Christ," he says. "They've reached my heart. I think I'll be harvest yet. Harvest yet!" You have to drag him back to the ship before he's calm again.

ChildBranches.Name: 物資を集める@{M}Gather supplies
ChildBranches.Description: 島にある茸の幾つかは食用に向いている。幾つかは猛毒であり、幻覚剤であり、厄介ものだ。幸運を祈る!@{M}Some of the island's fungus is good to eat. Some is poisonous, hallucinogenic or mischievous. Good luck!

DefaultEvent.Name: Nothing ever changes
DefaultEvent.Description: You join the fungers at their tables, breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The same faces turn up every time, without fail, to hear about your zee-adventures. One weepy funger presses his hand into yours, and fights for his composure. "Thank you, [q:Addressed As]. You're the only thing that eases the monotony," he says. The others swallow their fungus reluctantly, and nod. [Check your journal to be reminded of where the Last Constable might be!]

ChildBranches.Name: Search for the Last Constable
ChildBranches.Description: Join the fungers at their dinner table. Listen to their talk: could the Constable be among them?
